input.sentences: we were going through the attic and found this old family picture .
my brother found a few of his old computers he had forgotten about .
this candle was probably started 50 years ago | and we lit it again .
we scanned a bunch of our older pictures to keep them safe .
we took this picture of us right before going to bed .
output.sentences: Keisha found an old family photo in the garage.
She also found forgotten computers that she brought inside.
A candle she made in third grade was among the random stuff.
She decided to organize the garage and scan the photo so it would be safe.
She discovered another photo, this one far more recent, and decided to scan that one too.
